Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Imposes a temporary ban on the commencement of mortgage foreclosure actions and the sale of foreclosed properties
Summary: Imposes a temporary ban on the commencement of mortgage foreclosure actions and the sale of foreclosed properties for 365 days after the last region or county enters into phase 3 of the governor's reopening plan relating to the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to imposing a temporary ban on the commencement of mortgage foreclosure actions and the sale of foreclosed properties; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
